title: Ep 90: Jamie Kern Lima co-founder/CEO of It Cosmetics
itunes:title: Ep 90: Jamie Kern Lima co-founder/CEO of It Cosmetics
itunes:subtitle: Jamie Kern Lima, co-founder/CEO of It Cosmetics, is killing the beauty game right now. We talked to her about how she built her mega-brand, what it's like to lunch with Oprah, and if life is better as a blonde. Before that, we discuss Jes...
description:
Jamie Kern Lima, co-founder/CEO of It Cosmetics, is killing the beauty game right now. We talked to her about how she built her mega-brand, what it's like to lunch with Oprah, and if life is better as a blonde. Before that, we discuss Jess's dreamy escape to the Lush Spa, Jenn's mud-bath in the Dead Sea, and the Lenny Letter that begs the question, "Is exfoliation better than sex?" Hmmm.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
